snippet.title: Tubeway Level 1-20 longplay w/ cheats  (Apple II - Datamost)
snippet.description:
Tubeway (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tubeway_(video_game)) was an action game published by Datamost in 1982 for the Apple ][. The game creator, David Arthur Van Brink, also created another Datamost game called Ankh (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7sAicWV_tI&list=PLSdjkDPwvoOQD_9EbACi4zF51gT3GYNrh&index=25), which shared similar graphics design. In Tubeway, the player must destroy incoming enemies while dodging the germ (the "eye" that bounces up and down inside the cage at the lower left corner before it goes after the player). The game becomes unplayable at Level 18 (I guess no one is supposed to go that far without cheats), so I stopped at Level 21. Hope you enjoy the longplay!

PS: The # of lives is stored at address 0x00A3

Credits:
Cover art - yesterbits.com
